targets.rawSql:
SELECT
$__timeGroup(a.datetime,$__interval) AS "time",
ifnull(a.rpc4,0)+ifnull(c.rpc4,0)+ifnull(d.rpc4,0) as 'rpc4',
ifnull(a.rpc5,0)+ifnull(c.rpc5,0)+ifnull(d.rpc5,0) as 'rpc5',
ifnull(a.rpc6,0)+ifnull(c.rpc6,0)+ifnull(d.rpc6,0) as 'rpc6',
ifnull(a.rpc7,0)+ifnull(c.rpc7,0)+ifnull(d.rpc7,0) as 'rpc7',
ifnull(a.rpc8,0)+ifnull(c.rpc8,0)+ifnull(d.rpc8,0) as 'rpc8',
ifnull(a.rpc9,0)+ifnull(c.rpc9,0)+ifnull(d.rpc9,0) as 'rpc9',
ifnull(a.rpc11,0)+ifnull(c.rpc11,0)+ifnull(d.rpc11,0) as 'rpc11',
ifnull(a.rpc12,0)+ifnull(c.rpc12,0)+ifnull(d.rpc12,0) as 'rpc12',
ifnull(a.rpc13,0)+ifnull(c.rpc13,0)+ifnull(d.rpc13,0) as 'rpc13',
ifnull(a.rpc14,0)+ifnull(c.rpc14,0)+ifnull(d.rpc14,0) as 'rpc14',
ifnull(a.rpc15,0)+ifnull(c.rpc15,0)+ifnull(d.rpc15,0) as 'rpc15',
ifnull(a.rpc16,0)+ifnull(c.rpc16,0)+ifnull(d.rpc16,0) as 'rpc16',
ifnull(a.rpc17,0)+ifnull(c.rpc17,0)+ifnull(d.rpc17,0) as 'rpc17',
ifnull(a.rpc18,0)+ifnull(c.rpc18,0)+ifnull(d.rpc18,0) as 'rpc18',
ifnull(a.wsError,0) as 'ws error',
ifnull(a.wsClose,0) as 'ws closed',
ifnull(a.wsMitmRecon,0) as 'mitm initiated reconnect',
ifnull(a.mitmUnknown,0) as 'unknown error',
ifnull(a.mitmNoGame,0) as 'game not ready',
ifnull(a.mitmlogginIn,0) as 'login in progress',
ifnull(a.mitmTokenRej,0) as 'token rejected',
ifnull(a.mitmNotlogged,0) as 'not loged in',
ifnull(a.mitmLoginErr,0) as 'login error',
ifnull(a.proxyBan,0) as 'proxy 3h ptc login ban',
ifnull(a.authReq,0) as 'Requesting auth',
ifnull(a.login,0) as 'Login successful',
ifnull(a.swWarnSusp,0)+ifnull(c.swWarnSusp,0)+ifnull(d.swWarnSusp,0) as 'Account warned',
ifnull(a.swBanned,0)+ifnull(c.swBanned,0)+ifnull(d.swBanned,0) as 'Account banned',
ifnull(a.swDisabled,0)+ifnull(c.swDisabled,0)+ifnull(d.swDisabled,0) as 'Account disabled',
ifnull(a.swDayLimit,0)+ifnull(c.swDayLimit,0)+ifnull(d.swDayLimit,0) as 'Exceeded daily limit',
ifnull(a.swRange,0)+ifnull(c.swRange,0)+ifnull(d.swRange,0) as 'Got out of range 10 times',
ifnull(a.swTime,0)+ifnull(c.swTime,0)+ifnull(d.swTime,0) as 'Maximum connection time exceeded',
ifnull(a.backoff,0)+ifnull(c.backoff,0)+ifnull(d.backoff,0) as 'backoff',
ifnull(a.noAccount,0) as 'No accounts available',
ifnull(a.released24h,0) as 'released less then 24 hours ago',
ifnull(a.released7d,0) as 'released less then 7 days ago',
ifnull(a.minAuthT,0) as 'minimum auth time',
ifnull(a.maxAuthT,0) as 'maximum auth time',
ifnull(a.avgAuthT,0) as 'average auth time'

FROM dragoLog a
LEFT JOIN dragoLog_invasion c ON a.datetime=c.datetime and a.rpl=c.rpl
LEFT JOIN dragoLog_fort d ON a.datetime=d.datetime and a.rpl=d.rpl 
WHERE
a.RPL='$RPL'
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(a.datetime,$__interval)

SELECT
$__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval) AS "time",
rpc4,rpc5,rpc6,rpc7,rpc8,rpc9,rpc11,rpc12,rpc13,rpc14,rpc15,rpc16,rpc17,rpc18,
-- noGMO as 'GMO - giving up',
-- gmoPoke as 'Got a GMO: x pokemon',
-- 100*(gmoPoke-gmo0+gmo8)/gmoPoke as 'initial GMO success rate',
-- 100*gmo8/(gmoPoke+gmo8) as 'GMO failure rate 8/8',
-- (gmo0-gmo1)/gmo0 as 'GMO success after retry #1',
-- (gmo1-gmo2)/gmo0 as '#2',
-- (gmo2-gmo3)/gmo0 as '#3',
-- (gmo3-gmo4)/gmo0 as '#4',
-- (gmo4-gmo5)/gmo0 as '#5',
-- (gmo5-gmo6)/gmo0 as '#6',
-- (gmo6-gmo7)/gmo0 as '#7',
-- (gmo7-gmo8)/gmo0 as '#8',
-- gmo0+gmo1+gmo2+gmo3+gmo4+gmo5+gmo6+gmo7 as 'total retry',
swWarnSusp as 'Account warned',
swBanned as 'Account banned',
swDisabled as 'Account disabled',
swDayLimit as 'Exceeded daily limit',
swRange as 'Got out of range 10 times',
swTime as 'Maximum connection time exceeded',
backoff
FROM dragoLog

WHERE
RPL='$RPL'
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval)

SELECT
$__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval) AS "time",
rpc4,rpc5,rpc6,rpc7,rpc8,rpc9,rpc11,rpc12,rpc13,rpc14,rpc15,rpc16,rpc17,rpc18,
noGMO as 'GMO - giving up',
gmoPoke as 'Got a GMO: x pokemon',
100*(gmoPoke-gmo0+gmo8)/gmoPoke as 'initial GMO success rate',
100*gmo8/(gmoPoke+gmo8) as 'GMO failure rate 8/8',
(gmo0-gmo1)/gmo0 as 'GMO success after retry #1',
(gmo1-gmo2)/gmo0 as '#2',
(gmo2-gmo3)/gmo0 as '#3',
(gmo3-gmo4)/gmo0 as '#4',
(gmo4-gmo5)/gmo0 as '#5',
(gmo5-gmo6)/gmo0 as '#6',
(gmo6-gmo7)/gmo0 as '#7',
(gmo7-gmo8)/gmo0 as '#8',
gmo0+gmo1+gmo2+gmo3+gmo4+gmo5+gmo6+gmo7 as 'total retry',
swWarnSusp as 'Account warned',
swBanned as 'Account banned',
swDisabled as 'Account disabled',
swDayLimit as 'Exceeded daily limit',
swRange as 'Got out of range 10 times',
swTime as 'Maximum connection time exceeded',
backoff
FROM dragoLog_invasion

WHERE
RPL='$RPL'
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval)

SELECT
$__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval) AS "time",
rpc4,rpc5,rpc6,rpc7,rpc8,rpc9,rpc11,rpc12,rpc13,rpc14,rpc15,rpc16,rpc17,rpc18,
-- noGMO as 'GMO - giving up',
-- gmoPoke as 'Got a GMO: x pokemon',
-- 100*(gmoPoke-gmo0+gmo8)/gmoPoke as 'initial GMO success rate',
-- 100*gmo8/(gmoPoke+gmo8) as 'GMO failure rate 8/8',
-- (gmo0-gmo1)/gmo0 as 'GMO success after retry #1',
-- (gmo1-gmo2)/gmo0 as '#2',
-- (gmo2-gmo3)/gmo0 as '#3',
-- (gmo3-gmo4)/gmo0 as '#4',
-- (gmo4-gmo5)/gmo0 as '#5',
-- (gmo5-gmo6)/gmo0 as '#6',
-- (gmo6-gmo7)/gmo0 as '#7',
-- (gmo7-gmo8)/gmo0 as '#8',
-- gmo0+gmo1+gmo2+gmo3+gmo4+gmo5+gmo6+gmo7 as 'total retry',
swWarnSusp as 'Account warned',
swBanned as 'Account banned',
swDisabled as 'Account disabled',
swDayLimit as 'Exceeded daily limit',
swRange as 'Got out of range 10 times',
swTime as 'Maximum connection time exceeded',
backoff
FROM dragoLog_fort

WHERE
RPL='$RPL'
GROUP BY 1  
ORDER BY $__timeGroup(datetime,$__interval)
